property.name: Description
property.value: At the start of your turn, gain 1 subterfuge. At the end of your turn, lose all subterfuge.

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 3 standard wounds to a target if that target has any shadow injuries. Otherwise, deal 2 shadow wounds.

property.name: Description
property.value: When you would be dealt at least 2 standard wound, receive 1 less and gain 1 subterfuge. Cannot be used while you have any subterfuge.

property.name: Description
property.value: When you cure, convert, or remove an injury (even this one), take 1 standard wound.

property.name: Description
property.value: After your turn, gain 1 subterfuge and draw a card. You may only play 1 Stealth tactic per turn.
